description: A React custom hook 'useProfile' that fetches and manages the current user's profile data from a Supabase backend, including handling authentication state changes.

methods.name: useProfile()
methods.description: React hook that fetches and manages user profile data, role, loading state, error state, and provides a refetch function.

methods.name: fetchProfile()
methods.description: Asynchronous function that retrieves user profile data from the 'profiles' table using the user ID from Supabase authentication.

calls: supabase.from('profiles').select('id, email, full_name, role, avatar_url').eq('id', userId).single()
